item.title: AccelerometerSensorListener

Parameters Name Description sensor The sensor.

item.title: CameraService
item.description: Name Value Assembly Catel.Core Namespace Catel.Services Available on Xamarin - Android, Xamarin - iOS public class CameraService : CameraServiceBase Base types CameraServiceBase Camera service.

item.title: CameraServiceBase
item.description: Name Value Assembly Catel.Core Namespace Catel.Services Available on .NET Framework 4.5, .NET Framework 4.6, Xamarin - Android, Xamarin - iOS public abstract class CameraServiceBase : ICameraService, ViewModelServiceBase Base types ViewModelServiceBase Implements interfaces ICameraService Base implementation of the ICameraService. This implementation takes care of some protection code to prevent double initialization or forgotten initialization. This class ensures that the service is running when setting or getting cricical properties or calling critical methods.

item.title: CameraType

Fields FrontFacing The camera is located on the front of the device. Primary The camera is located on the back of the device.

item.title: ILocation
item.description: Name Value Assembly Catel.Core Namespace Catel.Services Available on .NET Framework 4.5, .NET Framework 4.6, Xamarin - Android, Xamarin - iOS public interface ILocation Interface that represents a location. Properties Altitude Gets the altitude. The altitude is the height of the location. Latitude Gets the latitude. The latitute is the angular distance of that location south or north of the equator.

item.title: ILocationService
